lead_paragraph: Formula One driver Sergio Perez said on Thursday he has dumped his sunglasses sponsor for a comment it made on Twitter about his Mexican compatriots after Donald Trump was elected as the next U.S. president.

headline.print_headline: Mexican Driver Perez Dumps Sponsor Over Tweet
headline.main: Mexican Driver Perez Dumps Sponsor Over Tweet

snippet: Formula One driver Sergio Perez said on Thursday he has dumped his sunglasses sponsor for a comment it made on Twitter about his Mexican compatriots after Donald Trump was elected as the next U.S. president....
